DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether ibuprofen reduces post-ECT headache reduces severity .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Pretreatment With Ibuprofen Post-Electroconvulsive Therapy ( ECT ) Headache
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study compare severity headache patient receive ibuprofen prior ECT treatment patient receive placebo prior ECT treatment . Patients randomly assign receive either 600 mg ibuprofen 90 min prior treatment placebo orally , blind patient , physician treatment team . Patients ask headache visual analogue scale ( VAS ) 2 hour prior within 2 hour treatment , 2-month , 6- month 1 year follow-up [ 5 ] .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive ECT Pregnancy , contraindication ibuprofen
